content:
Audiovisual Portions: $1050
Includes: 30 minute video where there is custom audio and video
Includes: 3 meetings and revisions ( note that revisions are discussed during meetings)
Other formats (e.g. VR, 360 video, etc.): Additional services and additional meetings will incur additional costs.

As discuss there is artistic freedom within the following parameters:
- minimalistic nature that includes geometric shapes ( triangles, squares, etc)
-colors mainly to be used are red and gray
- sound details hasn't been materialized or mentioned yet and examples should be given before the meetings or revision costs would be charged

Payments would be done in Late March and April
